marklogic.body:
I know you are a big Fan, so do not take this the wrong way...You have your numbers all wrong!!!
You are right that now has 72 PGA Â victories, but Rory only has 3, NOT 6.
Rory has 6 worldwide victories, so if you want to compare world wide wins between Rory and , it is not 72 vs 6, I do not have the exact number, but I believe its around 100 or more if you include World wide wins.
Comparing to Rory in PGA wins is 72-3
Rory hype is simply manufactured by the media, he will never come anywhere near what they are planning for him.
I see Rory not even Reaching anywhere near Phil`s status when his career is said and done.
Probably be along the lines of Els/Furic, nothing to Sneeze atÂ
